survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
hi!
alright! so, i'm currently at our starting point
i see a twig to the left leading to an island with a tiger. where should i go from here?
Go straight to the island ahead
got it, now standing on tiger's island
where to next, amigo?
turn right
okay, now i see a small island with a butterfly
am i on the right track?
no. you should see a parakeet on your left
my bad, i see parrot island to my left now
what's next?
go inbetween the parokeet and the elephant
done! i'm now in between these two islands
turn left again and cross over the two big rocks
zac, i crossed over the rocks and now i'm on a new island with a frog
what now?
to frog island
got it, i'm standing on frog island now
turn left again and cross over the aligator
cool, after crossing the crocodile i'm back on the elephant island again
go straight and go to giraffe island
okay, i've arrived at the giraffe island
which way now?
turn left and cross over to snake island
done, i've made it to snake island
what's the next move?
get around the snake some how and youll find the treasure
spirit! i went around the snake, and viola! there's the treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
hello!
awesome! let's get started. first, take a few steps to the left, just below that wooden bench you see
go ahead till you almost reach the florist stand. but wait, don't touch it!
ok. now what
alright, now do a snazzy u-turn to the left and cross back over the trail towards our white dog mate
ok. im here
perfect! now go south, straight down the map
you'll see another friendly pooch chilling next to a picnic spot. head there
ok. im at the picnic haha
enjoy the view! now, step over the mat near to that bowl of berries, and continue in the same direction, to the west
ok
great! now you'll see a wooden branch, use it to cross the river up to the north
ok
sweet! now once you are over the river, there's a green bush waiting
but we don't want any prickles so swerve around it from the right side. then head to the florist stand
ok
now hang a left, head down below the stand
there's a big bridge with two cyclists. make your way to it, but don't go over
ok
now take a few steps to the west, pass the bridge and you'll see two elderly buds enjoying their papers
ok
perfect! now just move a bit south between our paper-reading friends and another wooden branch
ok
awesome! there should be a green bush just ahead by the end of the wooden branch
head there!
ok
now for the final stretch! head east, keep the branch on one side and the bush on the other
let's go!
ok
fantastic! see that brown young deer a couple of steps ahead? that's your destination
you did really good!

chat.msg: hola, estas listo?
hello
hey there! i'm currently at the tent up north on the map
just saw a dog chilling by the fire. which way to go now?
go past the dog and turn left
cool, passed the dog
i see a red mushroom now. should i head south or follow some other path?
turn left on the trail and then turn south on the trail
alright, turned left and went south
i see a blue car. what's up next?
go straight and make a left crossing in fron of the telescope
got it, walked straight and turned left at the telescope
stay louth until you reach the trail
okay, stayed on the southern trail
go west oin the trail
done, went west on the trail
i'm now standing next to some rocks, is the wooden house nearby?
turn right at the rocks and go straight to the house
alright, walked straight after turning right at the rocks
i see the wooden house now. *finished*

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
hello! yes!
great! we start at the three palm trees, right? head under the first tree towards the south-west, swing a right around the second tree, and then a sharp left just before you hit the third
you're swinging down south now. got it?
yes
nice job! now, veer a bit to the left, but watch out! you're gonna have to bypass a cute brown puppy that is on your way
then, turn right to keep heading south. let me know when it's done
ok
well done! now you're going to move between a big rock and a small rock. the big rock's on your left, small one's on your right
then you'll reach the water. ready for a swim?
ok
alright! you're gonna meet a big red crab. when you see it, head right
you'll want to follow along the big rock and keep heading west. doing okay?
ok
good job! now, keep going until you see a third, medium-sized rock
you'll also spot a shark in the water. scary, i know, just quickly make a sharp right turn!
ok
perfect! now, our journey brings you back to dry land
you're crossing between the medium rock and a blue-yellow-white ball and then heading straight north
ok
alright! now, i need you to slightly veer to the left and keep heading north-west
you'll see a red tent on your left and a giant speaker on the right
i see it
awesome! now, i want you to curve around the tent in arc formation
let me know when you're done!
ok
brilliant! keep going south now but do not reach water
you're heading towards the shore now. see a red kayak?
yes
great! take a right and let's move along the kayak heading west
ok
good job! when you reach the end of the kayak, i want you to turn right, heading north again you’re almost there!
ok
nice job! you're going north until you see a small green bush
and just like that, you've reached the final spot! well done, mate!
thanks!
you're welcome! you did amazing! ready for another round or are we calling it a day?
another round
awesome! let's go for another one!
lets go!
let's do this! start at the three palm trees again
head southwest under the first one, then go right around the second, and sharp left before the third. we're going south, pal!
how do i start over
no worries, mate. we're back at the three palm trees
first, move under the first palm tree towards the southwest. then, turn right at the second tree and make a sharp left before the third. it's like dancing around trees!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I think it's interesting, and fun.
